section.name: Getting Involved
section.p: We do not currently have a very formal system for being involved in FISSURES, or for submiting suggestions or code. Basically, if you are interested, you should subscribe to the mailing list, and post your suggestions there.
If you have a project that you are working on that is Fissures-friendly and would like to let others know about it, send me an email and I will add it to the list of related projects.
